channel.title: L33T C0D3R5 H3LP M3 xD
channel.description: Kay, i have a Voule Auto-Restarter, and everytime it restarts the server, it rolls-back time like 5 mins. I was wonder if theres someway i can get a message to tell the people its gonna restart in 30 seconds. Like in the chat, "System Update In 30 Seconds." Is there anyway i can warn my players before it restarts, so they can properly log out?

item.title: L33T C0D3R5 H3LP M3 xD
item.dc:creator: @Fireninja4000 Fireninja4000
item.description:
@Fireninja4000 wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:1, topic:106355”]Kay, i have a Voule Auto-Restarter, and everytime it restarts the server, it rolls-back time like 5 mins.
I was wonder if theres someway i can get a message to tell the people its gonna restart in 30 seconds.
Like in the chat, “System Update In 30 Seconds.”
Is there anyway i can warn my players before it restarts, so they can properly log out?[/quote] Can you post link to reststarter

Read full topic

item.title: L33T C0D3R5 H3LP M3 xD
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I don’t know how to do that but you could just add this command if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("close") && playerRights =3) { server.pvpOff = 1; serverOff = 20; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server closing in a few seconds"; } and that would tell them that the server is closing.

Read full topic
